Text: Car RepairBarry I have spoken to my insurance agent Please take the car in for an estimate and let me know what they say After that I can work with the insurance company to get them to do the rest of the coordination Thank you I am sorry for the inconvenience and for the whole incident Michelle Wailes Equiva Services SGA Redesign Project Team ELB M email

FW Car RepairBarry please excuse me if you have already received this message Our email system was disrupted with a virus last week and it seems as if many people did not receive the emails I sent on Wednesday Original Message From Wailes M Michelle Sent Wednesday September PM To Tycholiz Barry Subject RE Car Repair I spoke to Poutous yesterday and they said you had picked up the car I paid them via the phone and they are supposed to send me the invoice Please look this over and sign if you feel it is appropriate or let me know of any suggested changes If you wish to fax it back my fax number is now Car Repairdoc Thank you Michelle Original Message From Tycholiz Barry SMTP Sent Tuesday August PM To Wailes M Michelle Subject RE Car Repair I dont know if I sent this to you or not I have made arrangements for my car to be repaired this thurs and fri Can you contact the repair shop and make payment arrangements I have not had a chance to draft up a letter and if you had something in mind I am sure I will sign off on it Thanks BT Original Message From Wailes M Michelle mailto Sent Wednesday August PM To Tycholiz Barry Subject RE Car Repair Barry As you can imagine I really do not want to have to file a claim with my insurance company Lets arrange this so that I pay Poutous directly Let me know when you will be taking the car in and I can talk to them about the payment As you suggested perhaps you can provide a letter regarding this and also fax me the estimate My fax number is Michelle Original Message From Tycholiz Barry SMTP Sent Tuesday August PM To Wailes M Michelle Subject RE Car Repair Michelle I have received a written estimate for the car repair The company that I plan on using is Poutous Auto Repair John You can contact him if you would like I dont know what deductable you have but with this pretty modest expense you may want to pay them directly I dont care one way or another but if it is easier on you and you dont want to claim we can make arrangements ourselves and I can provide you a letter or something acknowledging same Let me know BT Original Message From Wailes M Michelle mailto Sent Monday August AM To Tycholiz Barry Subject Car Repair Barry I have spoken to my insurance agent Please take the car in for an estimate and let me know what they say After that I can work with the insurance company to get them to do the rest of the coordination Thank you I am sorry for the inconvenience and for the whole incident Michelle Wailes Equiva Services SGA Redesign Project Team ELB M email This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant
